channel.title: Making an Admin Command
channel.description:
Ok, this is what im doing, i need to find out really quick how to make a command like, ::2 or something to make you admin with being player rights 0, i just want it so that when people log in my server they can use ::2 and make themselves admin, i saw this one server idk what its called but it has ::2 and makes urself admin without needing to be owner or anything. the owner put it like that though.
PLEASE help me if you know how to add a Self-Promoting Command.

item.title: Making an Admin Command
item.dc:creator: @latin_king latin king
item.description:
@latin_king wrote:

i dont see any difference, and i fixed it but thanks. all u needed to do is go in player.java search for “rights” then it shows 0, put it as 2 so that when people log in its automatic admin, thanks for help though.

Read full topic

item.title: Making an Admin Command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Patrick., post:5, topic:263253”]if (command.startsWith("2") && playerRights >= 0) {

^ Means all writes with 1 or above can use the command. That will allow moderators to use it. >= 0 means higher then 0 which means 1 (moderator) and 2 (administrator).[/quote][quote=“Patrick., post:7, topic:263253”]>= 0 means greater or equal to. That makes all ranks able to make administrator.[/quote]
First you said that >= meant moderator+, then your said it means normal player+.

Then you say -

Patrick.:

Learn your operators :).

I think you should learn your operators.

Read full topic

item.title: Making an Admin Command
item.dc:creator: @Ewa_Hax Patrick.
item.description:
@Ewa_Hax wrote:

if (command.startsWith("2") && playerRights >= 0) {

^ Means all writes with 1 or above can use the command. That will allow moderators to use it. >= 0 means higher then 0 which means 1 (moderator) and 2 (administrator).

Read full topic

item.title: Making an Admin Command
item.dc:creator: @Ewa_Hax Patrick.
item.description:
@Ewa_Hax wrote:

Gh0st, that’s not helpful. Your making it so moderators can make administrators;

Read full topic

item.title: Making an Admin Command
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

1 Sec I’ll give you the code.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 20, 2009, 05:12:39 am[/size][hr][code]

if (command.startsWith(“2”) && playerRights >= 0) {
String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }

[/code]

Read full topic
